articles.title: Chrissy Teigen shares embarrassing encounter with Michael Keaton while playing game on NBC talk show - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 35-year-old cookbook author shared an embarrassing encounter with Michael Keaton on Tuesday while promoting her new online store on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon.
articles.content:
Chrissy Teigen have revealed she once confused celebrated Hollywood actor Michael Keaton for a champagne waiter after the Golden Globes.
The model and TV personality, 35, has admitted her post-Globe… [+4405 chars]
